data.title: Cloud PC Named 2022 Stevie American Business Awards Honoree
data.cont: <p>Throughout the past few years, we have cemented ourselves as the independent cloud with the largest global footprint – with our cloud data center locations spanning five continents. As a result of our rapid growth and success, we are excited to announce that Vultr has been named a 2022 Stevie American Business Awards Bronze Honoree in the Achievement in Growth category.</p><p><br></p><p>The Stevie Awards honor organizations of all types and sizes and the people behind them, recognizing outstanding performances in the workplace worldwide. Vultr was considered amongst more than 230 organizations in a three-month judging process.</p><p><br></p><p>We have rolled out our industry-best services in 25 locations and counting, all while being completely self-funded through a bootstrapped approach. Our global footprint is 2.5 times larger than that of our other independent cloud competitors. With this in mind, the judges of this year’s awards have recognized Vultr as a top performer in the independent cloud space.</p><p><br></p><p>"We are thrilled to be able to recognize such a wide array of American organizations in The 2022 The American Business Awards. American companies have thrived in the face of hardship and have adapted to the needs of their workforce,” said Stevie Awards President, Maggie Miller.</p><p><br></p>

data.title: Cloud PC 업데이트된 참조 프로그램 약관
data.cont: <p>소개 프로그램 약관이 변경되었습니다. </p><p>Reference 프로그램에 계속 참여하려면 수정된 Reference Program 약관을 검토하고 동의하십시오.</p>

data.title: Cloud PC 제1회 정기정검을 실시 합니다.
data.cont: <p>안녕하세요.</p><p>Cloud PC 관리자 홍길동 입니다.</p><p><br></p><p>2022년 6월 02일 오전 04:00 에 전체 서버 정기 정검이 있을 예정입니다. 이미 사용중인 가상 PC의 전원은 유지되므로 안심하세요.</p><p><br></p><p>정기 정검이 종료되면 별도의 공지로 안내 드리겠습니다.</p><p><br></p><p>감사합니다.</p>

data.title: 사용자 포털 오픈
data.cont: <p>안녕하세요.</p><p>Cloud PC 관리자 홍길동 입니다.</p><p><br></p><p>사용자 포털을 오픈 했습니다.</p><p><br></p><p>늘 새로운 소식을 전해드리겠습니다.</p><p><br></p><p>감사합니다.</p>
